results.name: The 100 Best Fantasy Books of All Time by Time Magazine
results.description: Time Magazine called upon top fantasy authors (e.g., N.K. Jemisin, Neil Gaiman, Sabaa Tahir, Tomi Edeyemi, Diana Gabaldon, George R.R. Martin, Cassandra Clare, and Marlon James) to collect the most influential works of fantasy fiction in chronological order starting in the 9th century A.D.

results.name: NPRs Top 100 Science-Fiction and Fantasy Books of All Time
results.description: In 2011, NPR set out to make a list of what their listeners believed to be the best science fiction and fantasy books ever written. More than 5,000 people nominated books, then over 60,000 people voted on the best ones. This list is highlights the most popular books voted by NPR readers across these two genres.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams

results.name: Top 25 Books to Unleash Your Creative Potential
results.description: Creativity can flourish if fed by curiosity, self-motivation, and a thirst for knowledge. Below is a treasure trove of brilliant books for creatives as gathered by Lifehack's Tayyab Babar.

books.title: Drawing on the right side of the brain workbook

results.description: This list was created by NPR.

results.name: Stripe Press Books
results.description:
Stripe partners with millions of the world’s most innovative businesses. These businesses are the result of many different inputs. Perhaps the most important ingredient is “ideas.”

Stripe Press highlights ideas that we think can be broadly useful. Some books contain entirely new material, some are collections of existing work reimagined, and others are republications of previous works that have remained relevant over time or have renewed relevance today.

books.title: Scientific Freedom: The Elixir of Civilization
books.author: Donald W. Braben

books.title: An Elegant Puzzle: Systems of Engineering Management
books.author: Will Larson

books.title: Poor Charlie's Almanack: The Wit and Wisdom of Charles T. Munger

results.description: These stories take place in worlds similar to ours with magical elements that blue the lines between fantasy and reality. Their characters must first conquer their own demons before they can conquer any others.

results.name: Pulitzer Prize-winning Fiction
results.description: This list contains Pulitzer Prize-winning fiction since the Fiction Prize's inception in 1948. The Pulitzer Prizes and Fellowships were established in Columbia University by Joseph Pulitzer. Prizes are awarded by the University on the recommendation of The Pulitzer Prize Board and are announced in Spring. Nominees are organized into 22 categories across journalism, books, drama and music.

books.title: A Good Scent from a Strange Mountain
books.author: Robert Olen Butler

books.title: The Mambo Kings Play Songs Of Love
books.author: Oscar Hijuelos

results.name: The 70 Best Science Books You Need to Read in 2021
results.description: Well-researched, peer-reviewed discoveries fuel both Science and Science Fiction as this list rounds up the best science books you need to read in 2021.
